title: Ocean week enlisting problems

embed.description: Yes. Two skins will go on sale at the beginning of every day of Ocean Week. There will be a 30% discount on the following skins, with their respective champions also going on sale for 50% off. Each sale lasts for 48 hours.

body:
Ok for some reason i can enlist for the ocean week prizes, its the 23rd of the 1st but my mate from aus recons it worked for him.

All it dose when i click enlist now is make my page scroll a little, Anybody else having this problem?.

-TingTing

replies.body:
Hey folks,

Is this still an issue for you?  Were you able to enlist?  

We did experience a couple of issues with the site around when you posted this thread, but should be fixed now.

Cheers
Mindstar

Yes! thanks heaps

I am now enlisted and can't wait for the bonuses from Ocean event.

Cheers
-TingTing
Hi, I'm having this problem as well, I tried to enlist earlier to get the IP boost but it wasn't working, still isn't working now. Have tried on safari and chrome /:
Have you tried as of late, its worked for me now.
seems to be working for me now. Thanks guys!

Hey everyone,

I just wanted to check in and see if you guys are still encountering issues. Please let me know, and hopefully we can get you guys enlisted in protecting these cities!

- Also, be sure to try other browsers and see if that does the trick (Safari, Chrome, Internet Explorer/Edge).

Thanks!
All done and ready to defend OCE from the invaders :)

it's happening to me as well, after i click enlist came up with another 'join ocean week' box with 'enlist now' button on it and a cancel below it. but it does nothing if i click enlist, and cancel.... ye just cancel. plz fix dis ROIT (>_<) {{item:3070}} {{item:3151}}
Yeah when i click enlist now it does nothing but scroll the page up a little..
exactly, i'm worryed i'm going to miss out.
